programme.title: Shimmer & Shine
programme.desc: Follow the magical adventures of fraternal twin genies, Shimmer and Shine, who unintentionally create chaos while attempting to grant wishes for their human best friend, Leah.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.sub-title: Alien Pox - Mr. Garden Gnome's Princess
programme.desc: Astrid invites the children over to the Spaceship for a playdate. While playing, they start to feel unwell. What will make them better? The children are tasked by Mr. Garden Gnome to care for a very precious flower that isn't like any other flowers they've ever seen.

programme.title: True And The Rainbow Kingdom
programme.desc: True and Bartleby must travel through the forest at night to help the Yetis find more Ni Ni lights.

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Celebrity guests such as Misty Copeland, Terri, Bindi and Robert Irwin, Chrissy Teigen and Josh Gad appear in the latest season of Sesame Street.

programme.title: Kit n Kate
programme.desc: Two small kitties named Kit and Kate love their toy box. As soon as they hop inside, magic starts to happen. Kid's imagination transforms their room into a blueberry island, race track or a medieval castle. Every time the kitties create a whole new world with amazing discoveries, surprises and not-so-easy-to-solve dilemmas.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: The Triangle Aliens have been using a weather machine to change the weather in Ollipolis. But their constant fighting created a tornado headed straight for town! How will Ollie, Sloppy, and Cherry stop the tornado and save the day? Things are getting hot in ollipolis. Sloppy builds everybody air-conditioned domes so that they can stay cool, but is that really the answer.

programme.title: School of Roars
programme.desc: Five little monsters go on all sorts of fun adventures at their school with the help of their kind teacher Miss Grizzlesniff!

programme.title: Shimmer & Shine
programme.desc: Follow the magical adventures of fraternal twin genies, Shimmer and Shine, who unintentionally create chaos while attempting to grant wishes for their human best friend, Leah.

programme.title: The Fixies
programme.desc: The Fixies follows the comical misadventures of Tom Thomas and his secret friendship with Simka and Nolik, the children of the Fixie family that lives in his apartment. There's just no end to the troubles Tom Thomas and his Fixie friends get themselves into with all the gadgets and appliances around them! Luckily for Tom Thomas, the Fixies have the smarts, skills, and tools they need to figure out a problem and solve it before his parents find out.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen Railway Vietnam
programme.desc: Celebrated Chef, Luke Nguyen, in the next enthralling instalment of his popular series takes us on a culinary journey in Vietnam, but this time with a difference. Luke travels by train from Ho Chi Minh in the south to Sa Pa in the north embarking on a journey of the senses, which combines his love of food, travel, trains and the Vietnamese people.

programme.title: Jamie's Quick And Easy Food
programme.desc: Jamie's Quick & Easy Food is the ultimate set of go-to recipes that are quick to cook and easy to remember. Perfect for those of you who love your grub, but don't have the time or energy for complicated cooking.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: (Encore) Hosted by Pat Sajak, this game show features 3 contestants who try to solve a puzzle by spinning the wheel and guessing letters in a word or phrase.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Ah Yoke takes matters into her own hands and inadvertently puts her life in danger. Ella and Debbie continue to try to get Belle to help them bring Jessica and Elizabeth to justice. Ananya and Charles reach a new level of understanding with each other.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: At the hospital, Arjun discovers that the woman he tried to chat up at the bar, Keely, is his new boss. To make things worse, Keely is tough and uncompromising, and expects a high standard of work from her staff.

programme.title: Body And Soul
programme.desc: Ever had excessive sweating of palms or underarms? That is hyperhidrosis. It can impact the quality of life if left untreated. This episode of Body & Soul features Chua Enlai and Fiza O exploring the various options of treatment.

programme.title: The Muscleteers
programme.desc: Follows four daring rodents - two mice, a rat and a hamster - who band together to help those in need and fight crime in the Harbor district!

programme.title: Mondo Yan
programme.desc: The world has fallen into chaos and is now a stinky land of toxic cesspools and monstrous mutants, called the Chou World, run by the nasty villain Negu. High above, on top of ancient abandoned skyscrapers, a beautiful new yet fragile and harmonious world has risen: the Yan World. Protected by three eccentric Elders, three young apprentice misfits have been chosen to learn their secrets and protect this peaceful and idyllic place!

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of secret agent Danger Mouse and his sidekick Penfold.

programme.title: Regal Academy - Second Series
programme.desc: The Snow Queen is back and ready to attack Regal Academy, to get revenge on the Six Great Fairy Tale Families. Our heroes have to face the new threaten and stop some strange creatures popped out of thin air, that started assaulting the school. Rose will eventually find out they were created by her Pumpkin Magic, and not by the Snow Queen...

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: The Winx use their Cosmix power to help the Lumens and save Peripla from the black hole. The Specialists track down a mysterious ruby thief who has landed on Peripla, while the Winx have to face an asteroid monster sent by Valtor. The ruby thief turns out to be Orion, an astro-scientist determined to save Prometia, his planet, at all costs...

programme.title: Word Whiz
programme.desc: Dr Slime is back with more slime and a new and improved slime lab! Contestants will have to beat Dr Slime by solving the word puzzles, otherwise they'll get slimed and be stuck in his game forever as a minion!

programme.title: RenovAID
programme.desc: Sheree's empty and bare flat is finally getting the professional makeover it deserves. Interior designer, Aiden, has some bold plans to give her children a comfy space where they can grow, study and play. But with just four weeks to renovate, can his vision turn into a reality?

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: Matthew blames himself for what happened to Ah Yoke. Ella is determined not to let Jessica escape as she plots to flee overseas. Ah Hock's murder charges are dropped and he is released on bail.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.sub-title: I Thought You Threw That Away Last Night

programme.title: Emerald Islands Of Malaysia
programme.desc: The islands of Malaysia are jewels of the natural world, ecological paradises where ancient rainforests cascade down mountains into crystal clear seas. Each is a haven for wildlife, each boasts its own wildlife story. The episode features a number of enigmatic species both above and below the water. From silvered langurs caring for their bright orange babies and ants tending their herds of mealy bugs to boisterous mudskippers and a noisy fruit bat roost.
